lw r0,r1,0000000000000000
lw r0,r2,0000000000000001 
sll r2,r2,000000000010000
lw r0,r4,0000000000000010 
and r4,r5,r4
or r2,r4,r2
sub r3,r3,r3
sub r6,r1,r1
beq r1,r0,0000000000000111
sll r3,r3,0000000000000001
blt r2,r0,0000000000000011
sll r2,r2,0000000000000001
subi r1,r1,0000000000000001
jmp 00000000000000000000001000
ori r3,r3,0000000000000001
jmp 00000000000000000000001011
sub r2,r2,r2
or r2,r3,r2
hal
